## RemoteHandle interface

A handle to the other end of the connection

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface RemoteHandle<M extends MethodsType = any, E extends EventsType = any> extends Emitter<E> 
```
<b>Extends:</b> [Emitter](./post-me.emitter.md)<!-- -->&lt;E&gt;

## Remarks

Use this handle to:

- Call methods exposed by the other end

- Add listeners to custom events emitted by the other end

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [call(methodName, args)](./post-me.remotehandle.call.md) | Call a method exposed by the other end. |
|  [customCall(methodName, args, options)](./post-me.remotehandle.customcall.md) | Call a method exposed by the other end. |
|  [setCallTransfer(methodName, transfer)](./post-me.remotehandle.setcalltransfer.md) | Specify which parts of the arguments of a given method call should be transferred into the other context instead of cloned. |
